headline: Blackstone Refinances Debt for Luxury NYC Condo Tower With Munis
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Blackstone Inc. is refinancing $550 million of municipal debt for 8 Spruce St., a 76-story residential tower in downtown Manhattan designed by famed architect Frank Gehry. headline: Harbor Disruptive Innovation Fund Q3 2024 Commentary

headline: Blackstone announces changes to leadership team
summary: Farhad Karim becomes global COO of PWS, Chris Sullivan takes over as head of sponsor coverage, and Adam Lane joins as head of consultant relations.
